cd:Integer.cd:Description: The parameter holds five different values: 0 for ACE data, 1 for MSS data, 2 for EGM96 data, and 3 for SRTM30 data. Values 1 and 2 correspond to sea surface. Value 4 is the default setting. Since in case an input L1A product holds BRCs with different numbers of measurements per BRC the L1B product will report the max number of measurements occurring in the L1A product for every L1B output BRC, thus BRCs contain measurements filled with default values.
